entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 02:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
